BookFile.Header:
Save as Unicode UTF-8 text encoding. Skip section 2 in Part 1. Also skip section 35, annual observations from observatories.
For volume AJB 11 Index to the Literature of 1909 started 27 Sept 2019, finished 17 Nov 2019, proofread 24 Nov 2019, second pass started 20 Jan 2021, finished 20 Jan 2021
